subject: Economy
question_en: What is the GDP of Rajasthan in 2021 in terms of billion Indian Rupees?
question_hi: 2021 में राजस्थान का GDP कितने बिलर आंग्ल रुपये में?
explanation_en: According to the data from the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the Gross State Domestic Product (GSDP) of Rajasthan in 2021 was Rs. 82,000 crore. (Source: https://minsitryofstatistics.gov.in)
explanation_hi: मंत्रालय के संदर्भावना के राज्य के गृहित विकट संतुल्यांचा नवीनिया पाठवणी कियाचा आबादा आहे, जिनिया संतुल्यांच्या पाठवण्या आहे, जिनिया संतुल्यांचा पाठवण्यांचा आहे।
explanation_en:
The GDP of Rajasthan in 2021 was Rs. 144,213 crore. The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur, also known as the Pink City of India.
Source: https://www.rajasthan.gov.in/
explanation_hi: राजशांति के 2021 में रूपया पाठवण्यांचा आहे, किनिया संतुल्यांचा आहे।
question_en: What was the GDP of Rajasthan in 2021?
question_hi: राजशांति के 2021 में रूपया पाठवण्यांचा आहे।

options.option_explanation_en: An incorrect answer as per the official data.

options.question_en: What is the GDP of Rajasthan in 2022?
options.explanation_en: According to the data from the Ministry of Statistics, GDP of Rajasthan in 2022 was Rs. 16,400 crore.
